review_title: good social experience for entry level job
pros: very easy work, relatively high pay for an entry level job, gets to meet and interact with a wide range of demography amongst clients
cons: it can get very boring on weekends, sometimes need to deal with people under either alcohol or drug influence from clients of Out Of The Cold program

pros: Great team of guards and rec centre staff
cons: Limited shift availability, mostly part-time work

review_title: Enjoyed working with the children, but some of the other staff don't seem to like kids??
job_title: After School Child Care Worker in Toronto, ON
pros: My manager Nicole was absolutely lovely, but I think she has left the job. Great kids besides pretty normal behaviour issues, always enjoyed working there, they put a good amount of faith in their employees, and I was paid an excellent salary.
cons: Some of the other after school care workers were not great with kids, and one or two seemed to straight up hate children.  There was a strong culture of just supervising the children rather than participating and facilitating play and activities. This was frustrating to see, but I did my best to keep the quality of the children's experience high.

job_title: Social Service Worker in Montreal, QC
pros: Good hours, friendly manager. Lots of experience.
cons: Bad work relations between employees. Bad pay.

pros: Nice people, good benefit for employees
